body:
Fucking rookies hating on netorare!!
What so good about a good looking boy fucking a good looking girl~~ newbies like those kinds of stuffs
Ugly bastards fucking a beautiful girl is the best feeling ever
Btw this manga is amazing, artist needs much more appreciation....you guys go and read loli sex mangas

This girl is parody of Epser Mami, a comic made by Fujiko F. Fujio, abou a girl with ESP power with father is a painter, much like this Asami. They changed the kanji for Ma to read as Asa and adding Do to the tittle.
Agree with Junko Affairs, i hate netorare. Every time i read them, my heart hurts me. I was very disappointed with the "memory part". She's a "extreme powerful esper" but got tricked so easy...
I love that art! Dont forget Add Netorare tag!
Once again I fucking HATE NETORARE!!!! I can't enjoy something if I'm getting mad it was pretty good up until that memory loss bullshit.
